rules_text:
Multikicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Mudhobble Wrench enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.
flavor_text: [i]While likely not the most skilled artificers, the members of the Mudhobble tribe stake their claim as the most resourceful.[/i]
